name: Jump to the Sky
text: Trigger When a resonator you control deals damage to your opponent: Recover that resonator. You may put three hope counters on a "Lumiel, the Tower of Hope" you control. (Pay 2 to put this card into your chant-standby area. You may play this from the next turn if it fulfills Trigger condition and you control magic stones equal or more than its cost.)
set: The Castle of Heaven and the Two Towers
